description: I. A guide to the decontamination of reusable surgical instruments. 2003. 39 p. II. Decontamination of resusable medical devices. Health Technical Memorandum 01-01. Part A. 2007. 42 p. III. Dear colleague letter dated 23/01/1998 from Alistair Liddell, Director of Planning, regarding the medical services directive on CE marking. 5 p.
